        @RequestMapping(value="login")
@ResponseBody
public Map<String,Object> toLogin(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                     @RequestBody
                                                     UserLoginDTO userLoginDTO,
                                                     org.springframework.validation.BindingResult validateResult)
        Login controller.
        Parameters:
        session - HTTP session entity.
        userLoginDTO - User DTO
        validateResult - Validation result
        Returns:
        • For success: {"result":"success"}
        • For error: {"result":"error", "error_msg":error message}
        • For validation error: {"result":"field_error","field":Field errors}
